description: Defines core data structures and enums for a chess game, including Square coordinates, PlayerColor, PieceType, Piece, and GameMode.

classes.name: Square
classes.description: Represents a chessboard square with file and rank, including methods for conversion to and from algebraic notation.

classes.name: Piece
classes.description: Represents a chess piece with type and color, and provides Unicode symbol representation.

methods.name: toAlgebraic
methods.description: Converts a Square to its algebraic notation (e.g., 'a1').

methods.name: fromAlgebraic
methods.description: Creates a Square object from an algebraic notation string.

methods.name: toUnicode
methods.description: Returns the Unicode character representing the Piece.
